div.p: The Digital Signature Purposes, an indication of the reason an entity signs a document. This is included in the signed information and can be used when determining accountability for various actions concerning the document. Examples include: author, transcriptionist/recorder, and witness.
Copyright Statement: This value set includes contents from ASTM and ETSI which hold their own copyright.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://uri.etsi.org/01903/v1.2.2
Include all codes defined in urn:iso-astm:E1762-95:2013

description.value: The Digital Signature Purposes, an indication of the reason an entity signs a document. This is included in the signed information and can be used when determining accountability for various actions concerning the document. Examples include: author, transcriptionist/recorder, and witness.

copyright.value: This value set includes contents from ASTM and ETSI which hold their own copyright.
